page.title: 12ANSTEY SWIFTS FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content:
In Anstey alot of people like fooball. We have a local junior football team called the Anstey Swifts. It has been going for five and a half years. The pitch is behind the Martin High School. There are 6 different teams. The under 10 to the under 16's. The under tens are not doing very we;l this year. The Swifts play 24 games a year all on Sunday mornings. They play in black and white tops with black socks and shorts. At the end of each season there is a presentation when each player is given a plaque to comemorate the season they have just played.
By Craig Jordan Aged 10 Richard Whittall Aged 10
